thread.title: fab weeks trip
thread.title_full: fab weeks trip - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Aoife S
title: fab weeks trip
text: we were located on the fourth floor which meant we were woken up during the night by beeping taxis and loud banging of bins. the hotel was fab, rooms are small but so are a lot of other hotels we didn't spend much time in hotel only to sleep which it was nice to come back to a clean hotel room. I recommend this hotel if your there for a city break! breakfast is simple but lovely pastries. if your looking for a great location this is definitely the hotel for you.
